Tap "Finalize Route" when you are done. The iBaleka System was developed and planned by the All Blacks. All Blacks are a software development team, formed at the NMMU in the 2016 Academic year. To reset the password for your account, you will need to provide us with the email address that is linked to your account, or a username. To reset your password, please answer the security question linked to your account. Your new password will only change if you provide a valid answer. Confirm Password Process Change Password Average Speed: To begin running, simply tap on the start run button at the bottom of your screen.
